channel.title: Hardware on Nam's Journal
channel.description: Recent content in Hardware on Nam's Journal

item.title: 8-bit Computer in FPGA
item.description: Computers are mysterious. These machines have always been so enigmatic to most people. I can guarantee that if you ask someone on the road how computers work, they would most likely just answer “I don’t know”. I was like that for a long time, even after I started learning programming. So I decided that I will learn how a computer works by building one. At first, I was thinking about building a breadboard computer like Ben Eater.
